articles.author: Abner Li
articles.title: Google Search rolling out AI Mode to the UK - 9to5Google
articles.description: Following the US and India (earlier this month), Google Search is now launching AI Mode in the UK. Compared to...
articles.content:
Following the US and India (earlier this month), Google Search is now launching AI Mode in the UK.
Compared to AI Overviews at the top of a Search results page, AI Mode offers a more Gemini app/chat… [+1335 chars]
